Name: MarioActor
Notes: A controller that sets the spawn point for the player at the start of a mission and at Checkpoints. May also be used for other things such as the warp areas on the Comet Observatory. If placed in a generic object placement file, this will create a glitchy clone of the player.

Obj_arg0.Name: Entrance Type
Obj_arg0.Description: Defines how the player enters the scene.

Camera.Description: The starting camera to be used when spawning at this point.
